title: Amazon deal alert: 4K TVs, Echo Dot, Fire TV Stick, and Ring Doorbell on sale
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score incredible deals on Amazon's best-selling devices
article: We're rounding up this weekend's top deals from Amazon's latest sale, which includes massive price cuts on its best-selling devices, including 4K TVs, the latest Echo Dot, Fire TV Stick, Ring Doorbell, Fire tablets, and so much more.

Our favorite deals from the Amazon spring sale include the 4th Generation Echo Dot on sale for $34.99 (was $49.99), the 4K Fire TV Stick marked down to $39.99, and this 55-inch 4K Fire TV on sale for just $299.99. If you're interested in tablet deals, you can get the Fire HD 10 tablet on sale for $94.99 (was $149.99), a nice $40 discount on the Fire 7 Kids Tablet, and the Fire HD 8 marked down to $59.99 (was $89.99). See more of the top deals from Amazon below, and keep in mind, these are limited-time offers, so we recommend taking advantage now before it's too late.
